09-12-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rapid Recharge|Size=20} Rapid Recharge: Now gains +12% Weapon Damage (T1 Extra Charge gives +6%)
08-29-2024: - Fixed selling an item not removing charges correctly. Now you can't buy {AbilityIcon|Ability=Extra Charge|Size=20} Extra Charge and immediately sell it and keep that readied charge.
06-20-2024: - Now grants +7% Cooldown Reduction For Charged Abilities
- No longer grants +6 Spirit to Charged Abilities
